invariants.statement: Deviation operators preserve the underlying topological support of the domain.
invariants.formal: For any Box B with domain tensor D, δ(B) does not alter the base set of points of D, only their deviation, connection, or direction data.

invariants.statement: δ is linear on the domain tensor over its coefficient field.
invariants.formal: δ(aX \+ bY) \= a δX \+ b δY for scalars a,b and tensors X,Y.
